column5: Hello, I had a few questions for any journalists out there. Freelance or full-time, newspaper or magazine. PM me please.  Thanks!
Hey Andrew,  Freelance outdoor writer/photographer (fishing) here...  Feel free to send me a PM in regards to any questions you may have. I'll do my best to answer them.  Good Fishing,  Justin
I've heard of that Justin guy! Joe
Does the opinion section of the local newspapers count?   I get published all the time!
I write our local Lions bulletin. Does that count?
well I'm no expert    but I did stay at a Holiday inn last night
Maybe the hooker was a journalism student? did you get her number...??
JP (Dip Lip)used to frequent the board here.He still checks in from time to time.I know he writes pretty well also. Joe
It seems he abandoned us long ago... he was a good guy too.... fame n fortune I guess....  G
Ya JP and I believe Justin Hoffman also, some good articles!
